name: Claude Cowork Plugin Management
description: An agent that uses Anthropic's cowork plugin management knowledge work plugin
long_description: An agent that uses Anthropic's cowork plugin management knowledge work plugin. It defines 1 runtime agent configuration(s): claude-cowork-plugin-management (ChatBot). The workflow is shaped by 2 skill directory reference(s) (cowork-plugin-customizer, create-cowork-plugin). The bundle includes 8 embedded skill file(s) from the knowledge-work-plugins package. It is configured to run on image reference(s): us-central1-docker.pkg.dev/meshagent-life/meshagent-public/cli:{SERVER_VERSION}-esgz.
